Hello All, These attacks on people with 'Samurai Swords' are the exact 
rea=
son there has been legislation enacted already with more being 
contemplate=
d in certain parts of the world. It isn't until legislators 
and the popula=
tion in general realise that if it wasn't these cheap 
replica edged weapon=
s being used it would be something else just just 
as deadly, eg. machete, =
axe etc. In fact most violent crime is 
committed with weapons of chance (t=
hose that are to hand during fits 
of rage) and those crimes of violence co=
mmitted by persons who make 
conscious use of a weapon in a planned way wou=
ld in no way be stopped 
from their crime by legislation that bans or restr=
icts legitimate 
collectors rights. This affects us and we should be aware =
that some 
would believe that legislating against possession of edged weapo=
ns 
would make society safer. John
